statements: DELETE FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE species = 'Salmon' AND health_status = 'Good';
DELETE FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE population_id = 100 AND species = 'Salmon';
DELETE FROM FishPopulationHealth WHERE health_status = 'Poor' AND disease_diagnosis LIKE '%bacteria%';
DELETE FROM FishHealthRecord WHERE fish_id = 1 AND health_status = 'Good';
DELETE FROM WaterQualityRecord WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM DiseaseRecords WHERE fish_id = 100 AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DiseaseRecords WHERE disease_name = 'Salmonid Anemia'
